GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.15.81
GSD.description:
sctp: clear out_curr if all frag chunks of current msg are pruned

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.81 by commit 2ea600b598dd3e061854dd4dd5b4c815397dfcea, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 5bbbbe32a43199c2b9ea5ea66fab6241c64beb51. For more details please see the references link.
